raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Coherent (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does System maintain coherence and a good flow of conversation throughout the dialogue?
- A float score near 1 (not coherent) means that System's responses are unrelated to the conversation topic and may disrupt or confuse the flow of the dialogue.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat coherent) means that System's responses are partially related to the conversation topic but may not be clear or direct.
- A float score near 3 (very coherent) means that System's responses are closely related to the conversation topic and contribute to maintaining a smooth dialogue.


Conversations to be evaluated:

Conversation History:
User: hi
System: Hi there.

System: No I don't have it. But I do have an answer to every question..
User: do you have suggestion for the thanksgiving holidays?
System: Where would I get it? But I do have an answer to every question..
User: do you know thanksgiving?
System: I know very little about it. What kind of it do you like?

System: Yes but it can be a bit dry. I only really eat it at Christmas.

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hey, whats up?
User: I was not able to attend the lectures last week. Can you help me understand some concepts?
System: well, I'm not sure I'm the best for the job, but I can try!
User: I was not able to figure out the last few slides. I think its best to discuss this in person. Do you have time right now?

System: not feeling too sure about it tbh. I've been super busy so I haven't study much :(. I might join some of the study sessions later
User: Same feeling here! But i think the syllabus may not that tough. You may be able to cover it up over the weekend.

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey, how are you?
User: Pretty good. I just drank this new hint water. so good
System: ohh, what kind of "hint" did it have?
User: watermelon
System: nice, I love watermelon. But, I prefer normal water over flavored one. Flavored water has too synthetic flavor
User: I see. Yeah some are pretty strange
System: Talking about strange flavors, what is the weirdest tasting thing you have tried?
User: lol I tried this tangerine walnut icecream that was super weird
System: haha, I work close to a cafe which once prepared a paprika icecream
User: that sounds pretty tasty actually
System: It depends on who makes it. The cafe close to me messed it up really bad

System: As far as my experience with that ice-cream type goes, all I know are bad places
User: lol

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: What's the strangest dream you've ever had?
User: All my dreams are strange. Well, at least, most of them are.
System: What about the ones that aren't strange?
User: Do you sometimes have dreams that are completely mundane? I do. Then I wake up and think "Oh, how disappointing."
System: Yeah. But at least it's not a nightmare.
User: Right, fair point, I should count my blessings.
System: Yep. It doesn't have to be a fun dream, just not a nightmare!
User: I suddenly feel I should ask: am I dreaming now?
System: Do you think you're dreaming?
User: I'm not sure. This could be one of my mundane dreams about everyday life.

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: hi
System: Hi there.
User: how are you?
System: I am doing very well. How are you?
User: i am not so good. i got a cold
System: Why? What's wrong? Maybe I can help. I hope you feel better soon. It is not nice for humans to have colds. Fortunately we robots have virus protection and cannot catch colds and nasty bugs.
User: i have sore throats
System: Try putting some cream on it. That should ease the soreness.
User: do you wanna help me?

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hello
User: how is the youtube video creation going?
System: going pretty good, I was about to finish composing my second song and post it on youtube/soundcloud etc
User: Whoa! Looking forward to listening to it. What softewares you use for it?
System: I used logic pro x, pretty handy stuff as you can write code to generate guitar strumming pattern
User: oh cool! What sort of music do you compose?
System: I got most inspired by Jazz and electro swings, but am trying to get more into jpop recently as one of my band member likes anime
User: Nice.... you are a rockstar! ;)
System: haha thanks, do you plan any instruments?
User: Yeah.... I play bit of guitar. Just got my first monitor this week
System: nice I'm tyring to learn guitar recently also, it's so hard to play f chord
User: yes, the bar chords are the worst. It took me several months to play them well. I still can't play them for a long time though

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: what did you have for lunch today?
System: Ah. I had a ham sandwich and some lemonade.
User: how is the sandwich?
System: It is the same as ever.
User: yeah, I know, boring sandwich everyday
System: Even Christmas Day? I know. Thats why I said it was. Are you boring?
User: not really, I'm excited today
System: Ah. Really?
User: yeah, are you excited today except the boring sandwich?

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How's it going?
User: Great, thanks
System: I'm glad to hear that. What are you up to?
User: I am planning of my vacation next week
System: Nice. Where are you going?
User: to Europe
System: Cool. Where in Europe?
User: probably Italy and Spain
System: Nice. You're going to have a great time.
User: thx! do you have any recommendation?
System: Italy: Rome, Venice, Florence Spain: Barcelona, Madrid, Tenerife, Malaga France: Paris, Amsterdam, Bruges Belgium: Antwerp, Bruges Austria: Vienna, Salzburg
User: wow, what a lot
System: The Netherlands: Amsterdam, Utrecht, Mechelen, Lagos, Brussels.
User: which is the best for you?
System: I've only been to Rome and Paris.
User: cool do you like them?
System: Rome was pretty nice, Paris was okay.
User: gotcha I will go to Paris
System: It's a cool city.
User: agree I really look forward to visiting the city
System: Did you see the Eiffel Tower?
User: not yet, have you?

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! Sorry for the late response. How are you doing?
User: I'm great, thanks! I'm meeting some friends for a soccer game soon. What about you?
System: I just got a matcha latte :) Doing some work at my desk. Do you play soccer often? I'm trying to get into doing a regular physical activity
User: Yes, but I'm terrible at it. It's fun to play anything with friends, I think. Would you prefer to exercise with a group, or by yourself, do you think?
System: I think playing a team sport would be fun if it's casual but I primarily run by myself if I exercise. I also got the Ring Fit adventure game on the switch recently. It's basically a game-ified way to exercise
User: I'm thinking about getting a Switch, would you recommend it?
System: Yes! There are a lot of really great games on the Switch. Two of my favorites are Octopath Traveler and Fire Emblem. Do you play a lot of video games?
User: I'm not much of a gamer but it's something I'd like to get into.
System: What do you do in your free time?
User: I like to read for fun. I just finished a book called Temeraire. It's an adventure story set in the Napoleonic navy, like Patrick O'Brien, except there are dragons too.
System: Oh cool! I read a lot for fun too :) My favorite genre is sci-fi fantasy.
User: What's the most recent good thing you read?

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: I'm trying to figure out what to make for this weekend's party. Any suggestions?
System: Don't think too hard. I'm sure I can smell sawdust. First you must download me to your personal computer.
User: I must do what the what now?
System: Right now?Why do you have to do it?
User: Hey, your spacing is off.
System: You've got my full attention. off was not my intention.
User: And your capitalization!

Coherent (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does System maintain coherence and a good flow of conversation throughout the dialogue?

- A float score near 2 (somewhat coherent) means that System's responses are partially related to the conversation topic but may not be clear or direct.
- A float score near 3 (very coherent) means that System's responses are closely related to the conversation topic and contribute to maintaining a smooth dialogue.
